episode.creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.title: This Week in DAOs #003
episode.dc:creator: This Week in DAOS
episode.content:
Chase Chapman is a cofounder & advisor at decentology, an active and core contributor in many of DAOs including forefront, index, and rabbit hole, an angel investor, a crypto & DAO mastermind among many others.

We talk about:

  • Self-org structures vs traditional corp
  • DAOs and compensation - where and how to bridge the gap
  • What we can learn from traditional orgs

Follow Chase on Twitter (@chaserchapman)
Follow Kohei on Twitter (@koheingt)
Follow Shun on Twitter (@shunkakinoki)

‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒‒
